name: Brawlerz: Nitro
description:
Brawlerz Nitro is a fast paced Arena-Combat game, putting players in charge of insane nitrous-infused vehicles with everything a car needs - weapons & explosives! Experience team combat with deathmatch and soccer game modes in high detailed combat arenas. Play online or play split-screen (why not both?).Epic Features Include
  • Addictive 8-player online action
  • Up to 4 players can play per screen (split screen) in both offline & online games
  • Old school 2, 3, and 4 player split-screen mode for offline or online play
  • Soccer & deathmatch game modes
  • Bots that work in all game modes
  • No racing, why race when you have guns?
